DOC.brief_summary: Objective of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and preliminary pharmacodynamic effects of multiple doses of Gantenerumab in subject with mild to moderate AD.
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple-dose Study of Gantenerumab in Japanese Alzheimer&Apos;s Disease Patients
DOC.criteria: Have a diagnosis of probable AD dementia, based on NINCDS/ADRDA criteria Meet DSMIV criteria for Dementia of the Alzheimer type MMSE score : 16 to 26 etc. Meet the exclusion criteria of MRI at screening. A history of significant neurodegenerative diseases or dementia other than Alzheimer's disease. etc.
